mapper.select: SELECT orderLog.orderNumber, orderLog.wetherPayment, orderLog.wetherPaymentTime, CASE WHEN orderType = 1 THEN "立即堂食" WHEN orderType = 2 THEN "稍后堂食" WHEN orderType = 3 THEN "立即外带" WHEN orderType = 4 THEN "稍后外带" ELSE "外卖" END AS orderType, orderLog.orderPrice, orderLog.orderEatTime, orderLog.dayNo, orderLog.phoneNumber FROM ${tableName} AS orderLog WHERE orderLog.id = #{orderId} AND orderLog.orderNumber = #{orderNumber}

SELECT orderShopping.productName, orderShopping.productPrice, orderShopping.wetherDiscount, orderShopping.wetherActivity, orderShopping.productNum, logo.optionPath AS optionLogo FROM ${detailTableName} AS orderShopping, wechat_product AS product, wechat_option AS logo WHERE orderShopping.orderId = #{orderId} AND orderShopping.wechatCommodityType = 1 AND orderShopping.productID = product.id AND product.productLogo = logo.id

SELECT orderShopping.productNum, orderShopping.productID AS productId, orderShopping.wechatCommodityType AS productType FROM ${detailTableName} AS orderShopping, wechat_product AS product WHERE orderShopping.orderId = #{orderId} AND orderShopping.wechatCommodityType = 1 AND orderShopping.productID = product.id
